#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Contact.

== Name ==

*[CContact Contact]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Contact (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Contact type for country-club and players.
			The contact has a attribute named type to help identify the contact in a list.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...  other = xs:string  type = [SContactTypeEnum ContactTypeEnum.html]>  (name? ; phone? ; email? ; website?) </...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| xs:string || email ||  					Electronic mail address of contact.				 ||
|| xs:string || name ||  					Name or description of contact.				 ||
|| [SPhoneNumber golfml:PhoneNumber] || [SPhoneNumber phone] ||  Telephone number of contact. ||
|| xs:anyURI || website ||  					Internet web site URL of contact.				 ||      

=== Attribute Summary ===
        
|| xs:string || `other` ||  				Alternate value for an attribute.			 ||
|| [SContactTypeEnum golfml:ContactTypeEnum] || `type` ||  Qualification of a contact. ||

=== Attribute Detail ===
      

==== other ====

      
				Alternate value for an attribute.
			
=====  Type: =====

          xs:string
=====  Use: =====
        optional
=====  Form: =====
		unqualified
----
  

==== type ====

      
				Qualification of a contact. For country clubs, the qualification can be the reservation desk, the bar, the corporate facility's main number...
				For player, the contact type can be his or her home, work or mobile telephone number, home or work address...
			
=====  Type: =====

          [SContactTypeEnum golfml:ContactTypeEnum]
=====  Use: =====
        optional
=====  Form: =====
		unqualified
----
  

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CCountryClub CountryClub], [CPlayer Player]
----
